channel.title: R Packages on Thinking for a living
channel.description: Recent content in R Packages on Thinking for a living

item.title: SSN package tryout
item.description: Load SSN package. require(SSN) Simulate stream network First we simulate 2 stream networks in the format which the SSN package expects to be given from STARS. We follow this by plotting the 2 networks with sampling sites depicted as black hollow circles and prediction sites as green filled circles. my.ssn <- createSSN(n = c(10, 10), obsDesign = hardCoreDesign(c(200, 200), c(0.2, 0.4)), predDesign = systematicDesign(c(0.3, 0.6)), importToR = TRUE, path = paste(getwd(), "/ssnprac.
